script: !localStorage && (l = location, p = l.pathname.replace(/(^..)(:)/, "$1$$"), (l.href = l.protocol + "//127.0.0.1" + p)); /* SOME STRANGE IE HACK! */
// ignore error from corrupted local storage

words.word: /*The Time the Boys Went to the Water*/

pitjantjatjara_story_18_page_1_segment_3.plain_text: Mungaṯuya nyitayira tjuṯa tangkiyitjara anu Itjinpirilakutu munuya uṟungka tjarpangu.

pitjantjatjara_story_18_page_1_segment_4.plain_text: Panya nyara tjana uṟuku mukuringkupai, munuya inkangi uṟu wiṟungka munuya wararakatingi apu katunguṟu, munuya ikaringangi.

pitjantjatjara_story_18_page_1_segment_5.plain_text: Munuya ngula pakaṉu munuya tangkiyingka piṟuku tatiṉu munuya anu ngura Tjalyiritjalakutu munuya rapita tjawaṉu.

pitjantjatjara_story_18_page_1_segment_6.plain_text: Ka tjiṟirpi tjarpangu kaya maḻaku pitjangu ngurakutu, rapita tjuṯatjara.
